availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, surgeon. Kentucky native. Resident of Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Jefferson County in 1860. Served in 40th Kentucky Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as an Assistant Surgeon and Surgeon from September 23, 1863 to December 30, 1864. Served in Fifty-Third Kentucky Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as a Surgeon from February 28, 1865 to September 15, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District Two, p. 144B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District One, p. 830
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 425, 521.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 398.
